column1: Kata Robata////When the hostess came to seat us she somehow only had a table for 2
column2: despite us clearly telling her we had a party of 4
column3: so we were seated on the patio. The service was subpar and the sushi (roll) menu was very limited. When we questioned our server about other rolls and options
column4: we were told that they have all the 'traditional' rolls off-menu but couldn't put all of their rolls on the menu would be too big. Great
column6: but how are you supposed to know what those options are?!? Especially if you're first timers
column7: as we were. We asked if they had paper lists from the sushi bar and were told they didn't
column8: which was super helpful as well.
